details: I lost all my savings to Bitcoin...please help so I can invest in Neo and get it all back.
equipment: Four wheels, all of them round and only half of them inflated. Windshield broke some time ago so but there is foil to keep flies away. Also there is no steering wheel, I just tagged it to get more views.
description: If you have not been convinced already, I am also willing to hand over the used fragrant tree for a small additional charge.
contact: Please use the contact button on this page to contact me. The developers have assured me it works.
